0111161.title: The Shawshank Redemption
0111161.desc: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

0068646.title: The Godfather
0068646.desc: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

0468569.title: The Dark Knight
0468569.desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

1398018.title: Schindler's List
1398018.desc: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

2131456.title: Pulp Fiction
2131456.desc: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

0253474.title: The Pianist
0253474.desc: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

0118799.title: Life Is Beautiful
0118799.desc: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

0120815.title: Saving Private Ryan
0120815.desc: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

0114814.title: The Usual Suspects
0114814.desc: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

0169547.title: American Beauty
0169547.desc: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

0137523.title: Fight Club
0137523.desc: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

0208092.title: Snatch
0208092.desc: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

0109830.title: Forrest Gump
0109830.desc: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

0066921.title: A Clockwork Orange
0066921.desc: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

0118715.title: The Big Lebowski
0118715.desc: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

0086250.title: Scarface
0086250.desc: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

0099685.title: Goodfellas
0099685.desc: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

0113277.title: Heat
0113277.desc: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

0112641.title: Casino
0112641.desc: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a casino executive and a mafia enforcer - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

0042876.title: Rashomon
0042876.desc: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.
